entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Error The Internet connection appears to be offline. #21952
  • On iOS, ScrollView with MaximumWidthRequest does not limit the maximum width of its contents #21950
  • Crash upon resuming the app 'window was already activated' #21948
  • Changing ControlTemplate on Frame dynamically from XAML with DataTrigger does not trigger change on screen #21947
  • Installing of the MAUI Workload but no MAUI project was available #21946
  • MAUI Target Android Framework doesn't seem to be used #21945
  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: setSpan (12 ... 12) ends beyond length 10 #21944
  • Invalid Android Collection component EmptyView #21943
  • Switch Control #21942
  • [Android] ExpectingPageNotToBreak is currently crashing on legacy tests #21939
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [Android] NullReferenceException after changing background brush during StartSupportActionMode #21938

Closed

  • WPF Blazor cannot be started at boot. Error: There is no content at #19359
  • Maui Blazor App Without Root Page (@page "/") Does No Longer Work (Error 'Not Found') With .NET 8 #19326
  • [iOs] MAUI Blazor Hybrid '//' urls not treated as secure #19297
  • Runtime error when using class library with render modes #18812
  • Mixed Content Issue in WebView WinForms: Blocked Request to Insecure Resource #18229
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] APP crashes when "minimized" at android #17477
  • Context menu not displaying on Mac Catalyst with BlazorWebView #16726
  • iOS Blazor app crashes with TargetPlatformVersion=15.4 #10958
  • SecureStorage.RemoveAll() exception #21642
  • Net maui scrolling problem in version 17.10 preview 2 #21586
  • WebView weird behaviour on inputs that doesn't happen outside Maui #8953

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Add UITest for #21806 #21951
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry, area/keyboard

Merged

  • Go back to ignoring ExpectingPageNotToBreak #21940
    area/testing
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • [controls] fix leak in ImageSource, caused by Task that never completes #21928
    area/image :framed_picture:, memory-leak 💦
  • `LayoutHandler.Windows`: Store children to a local variable #21792
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [main] Merge SR4 to main #21936

Updated

  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • WIP: Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Previously selected item cannot be reselected fix #21490
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨, area/keyboard, control-window
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests #21840
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Update NavigatedFromEventArgs.cs #21658
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Minor optimization for `MergedStyle.SetStyle` #21540
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • Android mipmap/appicon failing with "APT2260" #21838
    area/single project ☝️, platform/android 🤖
  • [iOS] Allow compat iOS buttons to resize image and to respect spacing and padding #21759
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Xaml #21927
  • Inheriting Visual States #20467
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-refreshview
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, control-titleview
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-editor
  • [Android] Support for images inside HTML label #21679
    community ✨
  • [iOS] FlyoutHeader size change fix #21692
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, control-flyout
  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/gestures
  • Update NavigatedFromEventArgs.cs #21754
    community ✨
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
